mapper.select: select emp_no , emp_Id , emp_name , emp_nt_admin , dep_name as dep_cd from tb_employee join tb_department using(dep_cd) where emp_nt_admin = 'Y' and emp_status = 'Y' order by dep_cd asc
mapper.update: update tb_employee set emp_nt_admin = 'N' where emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tb_notice where nt_status = 'Y' and nt_top = 'T'
and nt_title
and emp_name
and nt_content
like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and nt_no is not null
and months_between(sysdate, nt_create_date) <= 6
and months_between(sysdate, nt_create_date) <= 1
and floor(sysdate - nt_create_date) <= 7

select nt_no , nt_title , nt_content , emp_no , emp_name , nt_count , nt_important , nt_top , to_char(nt_create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "nt_create_date" , nt_file from tb_notice where nt_status = 'Y' and nt_top = 'T'
and nt_title
and emp_name
and nt_content
like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and nt_no is not null
and months_between(sysdate, nt_create_date) <= 6
and months_between(sysdate, nt_create_date) <= 1
and floor(sysdate - nt_create_date) <= 7
order by
nt_create_date desc
nt_count desc
